gobblin.filesystem

Class MetricsFileSystemInstrumentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem
        • gobblin.util.filesystem.FileSystemInstrumentation
          • gobblin.filesystem.MetricsFileSystemInstrumentation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decorator, Closeable, AutoCloseable, Configurable

    public class MetricsFileSystemInstrumentation
extends FileSystemInstrumentation
    A FileSystem that extends HDFS and allows instrumentation of certain calls (for example, counting the number of calls to a certain method or measuring latency). For now it is just a skeleton. Using the scheme "instrumented-hdfs" will automatically use this FileSystem and work transparently as any other HDFS file system. When modifying this class, tests must be run manually (see InstrumentedHDFSFileSystemTest).
